body.name: Downy RINSE & REFRESH Laundry Odor Remover and Fabric Softener for Activewear, Active Fresh Scent, 48 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 18 mins
features: NEW DEEP CLEANSING FABRIC RINSE: Replaces traditional liquid fabric softener and acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove stubborn odors and residues deep within fabrics
3X ODOR POWER: The breakthrough laundry odor remover rinses away residues and odors better than detergent alone
EASY TO USE: Add detergent first, then pour Downy Rinse & Refresh in your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly in the rinse cycle
SAFE ON ALL FABRICS: Works with your laundry detergent to remove odors from activewear, baby clothes, towels and more
SOFTER, BRIGHTER FABRICS: Downy Rinse & Refresh breaks down and rinses away resides, leaving behind softer and fresher fabrics vs detergent alone
ACTIVE FRESH: Use with Downy scent booster beads for more freshness.
GENTLE ON SENSTIVE SKIN: Free of dyes and heavy perfumes, making it gentle on sensitive skin
body.description: Tired of stubborn odors that never seem to wash out of your clothes? Introducing Downy Rinse & Refresh Active Fresh, a breakthrough fabric rinse with 3X Odor Power designed to break down & rinse away smelly residues trapped within fabric fibers, leaving behind a light freshness. While traditional liquid fabric softener can deposit residues on fabrics trapping odors in, NEW Downy Rinse & Refresh Active Fresh acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove residues and odors from activewear and all machine washable fabrics. This leaves fabrics fresher, softer, and brighter than before. No more reappearing odors. Downy Rinse & Refresh, leaves behind a light, refreshing scent. Smelly activewear, musty towels, even forgotten laundry in your washing machine overnight… Downy Rinse & Refresh detergent booster strips odors away without the use of vinegar or other homemade laundry hacks. And because it’s free of dyes and heavy perfumes, this odor remover is gentle on sensitive skin and perfect for baby clothes, too. Plus, it’s easy to use! Just pour it into your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly into the rinse cycle. Want to add additional fresh scent? Add Downy Scent Booster Beads to your routine for extra freshness.

productInformation.value: #6,757 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #18 in Liquid Fabric Softener

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us The agitation, spinning, and heat of the laundry process can damage clothes at the fiber level. But Downy Fabric Softener smooths and strengthens fibers to protect clothes from the damage of the wash, helping them maintain their shape. By smoothing fibers, Downy reduces the friction between them that causes them to break and leads to pills and fuzz. And when fibers break, colors appear duller, so using Downy also helps keep your clothes from fading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this with every load. Laundry smells good, and the fabrics are soft and clean feeling. Better than scent beads that don’t always dissolve, and less messy than traditional fabric softeners

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Removes burnt dryer smell
reviews.reviewText: First use cupful in Full load. Bad smells gone. Laundry room even smells good after use. Fresh scent . 😌 large bottle. Good price. Saved a lot of clothes I was ready to trash. Sweat , burn, auto smells. Gone. Very impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was skeptical - but this works
reviews.reviewText: I love this and tell everyone about it. My son's soccer uniforms were starting to really stink no matter how many times I washed them. I've used this and now they no longer smell badly. This also took the dingy, mildew-like smell out of our towels (that were left damp too long) and they smell SO fresh and clean. I have tried other products to eliminate odor and bacteria but they've never worked like this. Totally worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Oder eliminator
reviews.reviewText: Love. Have a son who sweats a lot. Takes all the order out of his clothes . Smells fresh. Better than the Lysol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars New idea with this
reviews.reviewText: Not real sure what this stuff does. Not a real strong scent… doesn’t add to the scent of the clothes. It’s got pretty packaging and makes me feel like my clothes are less smelly. You decide and tell us… scratching my head. Huge fan of Downey products btw

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and softens and refreshes the wash given the air a fresh scent. Only the best from downy. Get all of the seats. Only Amazon can always supply you with convenient round the clock shopping. Shop in your pj's anytime and always find anything you need at great prices and fast delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff really is next-level for laundry! We never use fabric softener anymore and just use this with our detergent. Our clothes have never felt or smelled cleaner. I will also say, for my fellow neurodivergent friends, if you forget about your clothes in the washing machine for a day or two, they don't need a rewash with this! They still smell great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars when you just want a fresh smell
reviews.reviewText: This product works well for me because I use quite a bit of lotions and oils on my skin at night. This product eliminates that old oil smell that, for me, seemed to linger even after laundering the bedding. In addition ,It does the job without leaving a heavy perfumed smell behind.
